Hey You (and you know who you are),
    Just a thought but you might try putting the same or close to the same entry in your diary. But it is just an idea. You know, to see if the right people are reading it. It might help. Who knows but it is an idea.
http://pictabandt-tops.livejournal.com/10877.html

This is exactly the same entry i put in here not too long ago. and apparently it was not read by the right people. so here it is, I just hope that it is read by the right people this time. and for all of the people who are reading this again my best advice is to change your settings if at all possible to block anyone and everyone that could be a threat to you. 


I feel as if I should have something to say in here. I feel as if I have this journal and it should be used. I should be able to write what I want to write and not have it taken out of context. I mean after all this is a place to voice my thoughts, my emotions, my feelings. A place where I can say what I need to say and know that noone is going to pay any real attention to it for this is just a journal. But the truth of the matter is is that most people read into what a person writes. I do it to others, I know it gets done to me. The difference is if I have any questions or thoughts, I take it to the person who wrote it, not to everyone else. I don't spead it around like gossip. I don't tell others to read it. If they find it so be it. But what I write in here or my other journal is for me. I write in here for it is easier than a paper journal to me. I write here for I can delete if i want to and not see the reminder of it. This journal is for me. Your journal is for you. And if I want to say Fuck you in here I can, for that is my thought at that mooment. And you should not take it personally for you do not know who i said fuck you too. People need to know that this is a place to release emotions. If you can not handle that then you should not be reading it. 

This is mine, and no one knows why I wrote what I wrote but me. And it will stay that way. For I know that after reading what you all just read you understand that this is mine, not yours to spread around. And if I want anyone in particular to read it I will ask them to do so.
http://pictabandt-tops.livejournal.com/10652.html

I am sitting here trying to figure out my emotions, I feel as if I should be able to express what i am feeling, what i want, but in reality nobody is really interested in my emotions, my reality. They never have been. And they probably never will be. 

I have people in my life because i keep them that way, not because they make the effort. I have a couple people in my life who are the opposite. They make the effort and I love them for it. 

today I am emotionaly fucked. I have never felt this way before and I hope to never feel this way again. All I wanted today was to talk to my best friend and one other person. Well fuck that. Apparently I am not allowed to talk to one and the other I am not so sure i am up to talking with. 

Fuck me for being responsible. GOD DAMN IT.

If you are on drugs, how far is far enough? do you have to hit bottom to know how bad it can get before it is too late? What if the bottom is death? Don't you think that maybe there is a better way to know you need to quit? 

I don't know, drugs have been on my mind alot on the past 48 hours or so. I mean really on my mind. So forgiveme for these last two entries
http://pictabandt-tops.livejournal.com/9848.html

I mean Seriously, How far do people need to go before it is too late to turn around? Before it is too late to save ones self? How late is too late? Why do people need to do drugs? What is so appealing about them? What do they do for you? Maybe I am high on life, love, and nature. Maybe that is a drug in itself. But why do people do drugs? Is it an escape? Is it a different place you end up? But if you ask me when you come off of it you end up right back where you left and that doesn't solve anything? Is it one of those things where you are doing it because someone else is doing it and you thought hey they might notice me or I will fit in if I do drugs? I just don't understand. I want to understand. I always have and yet I probably never will. My best friend thinks people do drugs to fill a void in their life. Is it am emotional void, a physical void? What type of void?

ohh i just don't get it.
http://pictabandt-tops.livejournal.com/9620.html

So you seem to want to know what I was thinking. the thing is if I had written what I was thinking would you be coming back to read this now? Well Yes you would be, because you are you and you would read it, but the others out there may not rush right back and this way I am leaving them wanting more. But since it is you who asked first I am going to tell you what I was thinking.

I was thinking about you. I was thinking about the convo we had about keeping warm. I was thinking that I was going to have to crawl back into a cold bed alone and that saddened me. I was thinking I wished I had someone to keep me warm, just someone in my life to spent some quality time, to watch movies with, to sit and listen to the rain. I was thinking that was a quality I wanted in a partner.

I watched a movie just now. Camp. Not the video from the summer but the movie called Camp. 

I can say that was probably one of the best movies I have seen in a long time. In the truest sense of the word it represented camp. Camp at is best. Minus the alcohol. It was a movie about some kids doing something they love,  helping each other, forming a community that we so love about camp. A group of kids having fun, growing, struggling. All of them wanting to be normal, and realizing that normal is not ever going to be possible. Normal does not exist. Normal is what they can never be, for they are better than that.

This movie was wonderful, heart felt, moving. Thank you to the person who told me about it. Thank you for wanting to see something wonderful, for telling me about it.

I have decided that today should be declared national randomness day. It is so fantastic of a day. So here is it in a nut shell so you call can understand.

I made two batches of cookies, one chocolate chip the other M&M, I bought dafodills, I wore a hat or two at one time depending on when, I talked to my aunt that I never see and told her that I was happy, and she thought I was nuts, A really great friend told me I am so random, which is so true, and I watched american idol, which i can't stand. Ohh and I made dinner and it was done just as my grandmother pulled into the driveway. Nothing like perfect timing. Ohh and i was looking at the JC Penny Catalog and picked out this orange shirt my grandmother is going to get me.

Can I tell you the dafodills are so fantastic, they just brightened my day. So i went into the store and there they were right in front of me. And i was so lost, I had to call my old roomamte and ask how to choose flowers, I told her out of all the girly qualities I inheritated choosing flowers was not one of them, she always did that for me. I just went with the ones I likes, which as I have come to learn is the way to go. They were 10 flowers for $1.50. $1.5o for a day and more of happiness, and smiles, cheer. Ohh it was so fantastic, and so random for me.

The cookies, really I normally make chocolate chip when i give them away, this time, M&M. It was so colorful, it was fantastic. 

Today is a day for color and spring. I loved it. 

Today is National Randomness Day as far as I am concerned. I wonder if there is anyway to make that come true? Hmmm.

So here I am sitting on my computer when I should be sleeping. It is not like I got up early this morning, so it is not like I am tired but I do have to get up early in the morning. 

I will not promiss you any interesting entries, I will give you my life. That I am sure is all you can really ask for anyway. Although some might want more.

I will not lie, I will not try to impress you with the glamorous stuff, or try to convince you that I am fabulous, Although given time I am sure that will be proven anyway.

Basically I work, sleep, talk, eat, love, and live. Anything else is extra on any given day. And I like the extras. So stick around and find out what they are.
